title: 30 The Power of Sleep for Entrepreneurs and Elite Athletes with Ameer Rosic
description: Do you get enough sleep? Or do you constantly feel drained, tired, and find yourself yawning throughout you day? Sleep might be the most important aspect of building a great business, and having a high performing body. It is also, one of the most overlooked aspects considering the focus on diet and working out.
